name: Kandos K Super Nut Milk Choco
description: Milk Chocolate - All the goodness of milk blended with the rich taste of fine chocolate combining the finest ingredients. Kandos 21 Collection Five Star - The ultimate in exquisite chocolates made with the worlds finest grade of cocoa butter bringing you a range of fine flavours to satisfy the connoisseur in you. Milk chocolate with nuts.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
